title: rounded sans serif font {CreativeNRG}
content:
Gurus

Please help I.D. this font. I tried indentifont website—no luck.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sparrowx.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193836/http:/typophile.com/files/sparrowx.jpg) | 35.24 KB |
author: Thingone

comments.content:
Looks like lowercase letters from Estilo Script, but the “s” and “w” are modified. Hmm.

—  
Dave Ward Photography  
 [http://www.DaveWard.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193836/http:/www.daveward.net/ "http://www.DaveWard.net")

Looks a lot like [Register Sans BTN](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193836/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/btn/register-sans-btn/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D118%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3Dsparrow%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D29) with some slight modifications.

There is also something close called [Eurofurence](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193836/http:/www.dafont.com/eurofurence.font?nb_ppp=50&psize=l&text=sparrow) on dafont but the “a” is wrong.
